description:
AJMJ-22 EMBROIDERED PAPER COTTON 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Paper Cotton Trouser: Lawn Silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Purple

Asim Jofa’s “Jag Mag Collection” unveils this creation that marries the earthy tones of rust with the royal essence of purple. The ensemble’s shirt is a canvas of celebration where the neckline is not just embroidered but crowned with gold sequins and zari complemented by the vibrant strokes of magenta threadwork. The purple embroidered dupatta is the perfect counterpart framing this outfit in a narrative of elegance and festivity. Adorn yourself in this ensemble and embody the spirit of celebration.
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered center panel on paper cotton

Embroidered right panel with front chaak border on paper cotton

Embroidered left panel with back chaak border on paper cotton

30'' dyed wide-width paper cotton for back

30'' embroidered border for back on paper cotton

Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on lawn silk

2.5 meters embroidered dupatta on chiffon

1.5 meters dyed wide-width lawn silk for trouser
